exports.name: ChainhooksService

A service wrapper for interacting with the Hiro Chainhooks API.
Provides convenient methods for common chainhook operations.

exports.name: formatStxAmount

signatures.description: Formats a microSTX amount to STX with proper decimal places

exports.description: Formats a microSTX amount to STX with proper decimal places

tags.name: param
tags.text: microStx - Amount in microSTX (1 STX = 1,000,000 microSTX)

tags.name: returns
tags.text: Formatted string with STX amount

tags.name: example
tags.text:
```typescript
formatStxAmount("1000000") // "1.000000 STX"
formatStxAmount(1500000)   // "1.500000 STX"
```

Use this in your webhook handler to safely parse incoming requests.
